introduce_product: Introducing a new model created in collaboration between BABY-G, the casual watch for active women, and 5252 by o!oi, the iconic Seoul fashion brand that is always at the forefront of Korean street fashions.
list_specification_product: Selectable illumination duration (1.5 seconds or 3 seconds), afterglow
29 time zones (48 cities), daylight saving on/off
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown start time setting range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
Regular timekeeping: Hour, minute, second, am/pm, date, day
Approx. battery life: 3 years on CR1616
